Package slate

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • slate.Inventory
  • public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for managing items

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Inventory.ItemCollection
      Collection of duplicate items.
      class  Inventory.Stack
      A pair of an item name, and the number of them stored

    • Constructor Summary

      Inventory​(java.lang.String name, int size)
      Construct an inventory of a specific size, no locks
      Inventory​(java.lang.String name, int size, int locks)
      Locked inventory

        Parameters:
        name - Inventory name
        size - Maximum size
        locks - Number of locks required to open the inventory

      • putItem

        public void putItem​(java.lang.String name,
                    ItemBase item)
             throws ItemSizeException
        Add an item to storage. If duplicate, it will be tracked ia a counter
        Parameters:
        name - Item name (should be generated by ItemBase.getName())
        item - Item object to store
        Throws:
        ItemSizeException
